game.name: Train Simulator: Amtrak AEM-7
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The reign of the remarkable Amtrak AEM-7 electric was long and successful on Amtrak’s Northeast Corridor, and you can relive and enjoy the experience with the all-new AEM-7 for Train Simulator Classic!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The reign of the remarkable Amtrak AEM-7 electric was long and successful on Amtrak’s Northeast Corridor, and you can relive and enjoy the experience with the all-new AEM-7 for Train Simulator Classic!
